channel.title: Place to post self application?
channel.description: Is there a place on the forums to post a self application that advertises yourself for a staff position?. as in, posting a little bio of yourself and others read it and see if they want you to be apart of their staff team ;) like is it possible to post a personal application on the development teams page as your own topic? or is that not allowed? thank's P.S Ik probably a dumbass question -.-

are you trying to post a app for moparscape forums staff?? if so you cant apply for that your chosen for that, and if you wanna be staff on other servers go to server development team and post what your specialty’s are and hope they give you staff…
